name: ELISEISK 2074
description:
ELISEISK2074 is a text-based adventure game ( set in futuristic post-soviet cyberpunk world). You’ll take on the role of a nameless resistance fighter working for mysterious “Spark” organization, which seeks to restore order in his hometown. Will you be able to survive in this unfair and dangerous future, or will it claim your life instead? It all depends on what you’ll choose…

Eliseysk 2074 features:

  • Atmospheric futuristic setting
  • Post-soviet rendition of cyberpunk
  • Lots of easter eggs for some of the hawk-eyed players
  • Unexpected and various ways to die
  • Unorthodox saving system.



Technological advancement was too fast for us to stop it, changing our lives forever as a result. Life, religion, even our own mortality– everything was transformed in the wake of a new age. Over the course of 50 years, we have been blessed with revolutionary discoveries in the fields of VR technology, life extension, and industrial manufacturing.



But progress always comes at a heavy price. Thanks to the accessibility of human body implants and augmentations on the black market, multiple criminal syndicates have emerged from the shadows, now vying for control over smaller towns and settlements.



The once prosperous town is now desolate, standing as a grim reminder of human greed and viciousness. Many of its citizens have either fled towards larger settlements in search of retribution and new life or were stolen away by one of the numerous gangs. My city was no exception, but...

There is always a man…
